tooltip.artifacts.snorkel: Allows the wearer to breathe underwater
tooltip.artifacts.plastic_drinking_hat: Decreases the time it takes to drink drinkable items
tooltip.artifacts.novelty_drinking_hat: 'Hey! I'm #1, and I let gravity do my drinking!'
tooltip.artifacts.night_vision_goggles: Allows the wearer to see in the dark
tooltip.artifacts.panic_necklace: Increases the wearer's movement speed after taking damage
tooltip.artifacts.shock_pendant: Has a chance to strike attackers with lightning
tooltip.artifacts.flame_pendant: Has a chance to light attackers on fire
tooltip.artifacts.thorn_pendant: Has a chance to damage attackers
tooltip.artifacts.obsidian_skull: The wearer becomes temporarily immune to fire damage when hurt by fire
